body: Catfolk's generally friendly disposition doesn't preclude craftiness. Some of them see social obstacles as games to be played and won. These catfolk receive a +2 racial bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Sense Motive checks. This racial trait replaces natural hunter.
name: Clever Cat
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Catfolk/Alternate Racial Traits/Clever Cat
